entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:06 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
